en_text:
Congratulations,
congratulations!
jp_text: ユーリス！

en_text:
JUST KEEP ON TRYING,
KEEP ON FLYING.
jp_text: {\fn华文细黑}keep on flying

en_text: I WILL BE THE LIGHT.
jp_text: {\fn华文细黑}I will be the light

en_text:
If we think of the dawn
as one beginning...
jp_text: {\fn华文细黑}つの始まりとするなら
google_translated: If it is the beginning of }

en_text:
If we think of right now
as the time to come...
jp_text: {\fn华文细黑}今が来るべき時だとするなら
google_translated: If it is time to come now

en_text:
Oh, can I encounter
a moment...
jp_text: {\fn华文细黑}Ah 魔法のような一瞬に会えるのか？
google_translated: }} Can I meet a moment like magic?

en_text:
...the two of us
flap our wings...
jp_text: {\fn华文细黑}冷たい夜を引き替えに　二人は　羽ばたいて

en_text: Ship 1 is back.
jp_text: お嬢ちゃん　今夜はごちそうだね

en_text:
She made
it back, huh?
jp_text: 当たり前だろう

en_text: Al?
jp_text: 三番水？　私も飲んでいいの？

en_text:
Yeah, getting ready
to take Al over to Exile.
jp_text: じゃ　おまけしとかなきゃな

en_text:
It's practically
a ghost ship.
jp_text: 変わり者の貴族だ
google_translated: It is a noble person's noble

en_text: Nobody's aboard them.
jp_text: クラウスの父さんは\N自由の空が恋しくてこの土地に下りてきた

en_text:
You find food,
books lying open...
jp_text: わたしを生んですぐ死んでしまった母さん...
google_translated: Mother who has died soon and died soon ...

en_text: Somebody's here.
jp_text: あたしの誕生日は　母さんの命日と同じ日だ
google_translated: My birthday is the same day as my mother's life

en_text: Let's go.
jp_text: よし　行こう

en_text: Hey!
jp_text: クラウス　これお願い

en_text:
I guess Lavie and Al
are gone, too, huh?
jp_text: わたしと父さんを

en_text:
There's no hint of anybody being aboard.
Something's not right here.
jp_text: あたしは母さんの顔をしらない
google_translated: I do not know my mom's face

en_text: It's blood.
jp_text: では　つぎの仕事だ

en_text:
I've been waiting
for you, Dio.
jp_text: 飛行中は目を離さずに　しっかり見とくんだぞ
google_translated: During the flight, I can not release my eyes and see

en_text:
Dio?
Who's this?
jp_text: これ何？

en_text:
This woman is Maestro Delphine.
Disrespect will not be tolerated.
jp_text: このタイミングは　肝心なんだ

en_text:
You were taking forever to come home,
so I came to get you.
jp_text: これでとべるよ

en_text: I'm so glad.
jp_text: これ　あげるよ

en_text:
I believe that this is the first time
that Dio has ever made a friend.
jp_text: 父さん達がこの手紙をデュシスに届ければ
google_translated: If the father delivers this letter to Dusys

en_text:
Oh, I know! We'll have you come
to the Guild for a visit!
jp_text: グランドストリームを越えるの？
google_translated: Do you cross the ground stream?

en_text:
You will accept our invitation,
won't you?
jp_text: 一つ

en_text:
- Cicada.
- Milady?
jp_text: すごい

en_text:
This ship's captain still hasn't
come out to introduce himself?
jp_text: オマエもいつかこの青いそらを

en_text: Capture the entire crew.
jp_text: 星が十個も

en_text: Hop to it!
jp_text: よし　いい子だ

en_text:
Cicada, you stay behind and find anyone
who might know the Mysteria.
jp_text: だれよりも高く　だれよりも遠くまで飛ぶんだぞ
google_translated: It's higher than anyone, it will fly far away

en_text:
You mustn't be hasty
and kill them.
jp_text: 気をつけて

en_text:
I will send over
an interrogator later.
jp_text: クラウス　母さんを頼んだぞ

en_text: DIO!
jp_text: ユスティナ

en_text:
I'm getting a Claudia signature
in the hangar!
jp_text: 父さん　行ってらっしゃい
google_translated: I'm going to go my father

en_text: Formica, come in!
jp_text: 帰ってきたら　またヴァンシップに乗せてね
google_translated: If you come back again, put it on the van ship

en_text: Formica?
jp_text: 行ってらっしゃい

en_text: A Dagobert...
jp_text: 半年後　辛労から
google_translated: From half a year after half a year

en_text:
There's no need
to be frightened, Alvis.
jp_text: 私達にはもう　誰もいない

en_text:
I knew Hamilton, the man who
raised you, for a long, long time.
jp_text: お兄ちゃんを見たのも　あれが最後だ
google_translated: It is also the last that I saw my brother

en_text:
She tried
to kill him.
jp_text: あのお兄ちゃんが一人で伝えに来て
google_translated: That older brother came to convey alone

en_text: This is the Silvana's Heavy Cargo. Requesting landing clearance.
jp_text: インメルマンが見てるよ

en_text: Vincent, the Silvana has been taken over by the Guild.
jp_text: 早く飛びたいんだ

en_text:
My, how rude
you are, Captain.
jp_text: 何してるの？

en_text:
Admittedly, this does save us
the trouble of searching for you.
jp_text: グランドストリームを越えるために

en_text:
I beg of you.
Behave yourself.
jp_text: やった　クラウス

en_text: Luciola?
jp_text: 飛んだ？

en_text: Luciola...
jp_text: 私達　飛んでる...

en_text:
Prepare one of their small vessels
for transport.
jp_text: 父さん達のヴァンシップを守った
google_translated: Father protected the vanship of my father

en_text: I'm fine.
jp_text: 僕ら　飛んでるんだよ

en_text: Milady?
jp_text: クラウス　何してんの？

en_text: Don't ever give up...
jp_text: がんばろう　すこしずつ

en_text:
Now you are injured and have
lost sight of your dreams.
jp_text: 二人でがんばれば

en_text: I'II... keep you safe.
jp_text: 取ったか

en_text:
This will calm
your nerves.
jp_text: あれはんヴァルカとこの息子じゃ
google_translated: That's my son and this son

en_text:
Tomorrow is an important day.
He'll become a man.
jp_text: もう一息だね

en_text:
You'll celebrate it with me,
won't you?
jp_text: {\an8}you taught me how to fly\N{\c&H01FF73&}父さんの飛び方
google_translated: You taught me How To Fly \ N  Father's flying

en_text:
You know what Units are,
don't you?
jp_text: {\an8}in memory of you\N{\c&H01FF73&}父さんの記憶を辿り
google_translated: in Memory of YOU \ N  Father tracing

en_text:
These are the proof of the Guild's benevolence
towards the land-dwellers.
jp_text: {\an8}turn the ship around\N{\c&H01FF73&}飛行船の向きを変え
google_translated: turn the ship about \ n  Changing the direction of the flying ship

en_text:
Take a look. This is where the
Rite of the Covenant will be held.
jp_text: では　つぎの仕事は星二つだ
google_translated: So the next job is two star

en_text: Agoon?
jp_text: {\an8}keep flying\N{\c&H01FF73&}飛び続けて
google_translated: Keep Flying \ n  Continue to fly

en_text:
But those clothes simply won't do.
We have to get you changed.
jp_text: {\an8}don't think so\N{\c&H01FF73&}僕は思ってないけれど
google_translated: Don't Think So \ N  I do not think

en_text:
Let go!
Let go of me!
jp_text: {\an8}shake me free\N{\c&H01FF73&}自由になる

en_text: I-I don't want to!
jp_text: 私　戦うヴァンシップには乗りたくない
google_translated: I do not want to get on my fight van

en_text: This is your destiny.
jp_text: これが私たちのヴァンシップなんだから
google_translated: Because this is our van ship

en_text: Oh, my!
jp_text: ラヴィが見てくれるなら　僕は安心して飛べる
google_translated: If Lavi will be seen, I will fly in peace

en_text:
Aren't they
eating with us?
jp_text: クラウスといっしょに

en_text:
It'll be okay.
I'm with you.
jp_text: {\an8}though I'm trapped inside a storm it won't defeat me\N{\c&H01FF73&}嵐の中　奥深くにいても　邪魔を振り払って
google_translated: Though I'm Trapped Inside A Storm It Won't Defeat Me \ N  I shake disturbed even if it is deep in the storm

en_text:
So, they came
after us...
jp_text: 父さん…

en_text:
The Guild ship
has opened fire!
jp_text: わかるか　俺だよ　モラン・シェトランドだよ
google_translated: I understand or I'm Moran Shetland

en_text: Isn't that wonderful?
jp_text: あれは...

en_text:
At the very least,
send Al back.
jp_text: まだ戻ってこない
google_translated: I will not go back yet

en_text:
It takes a 100 gallons of First Water
to remove the mud.
jp_text: 見つけた

en_text:
How naive
you are!
jp_text: 大丈夫か

en_text:
...you would soon
die out.
jp_text: ラヴィ…

en_text:
That is why I represent everyone
and sample the finest pleasures.
jp_text: こうか

en_text: Yes, sister.
jp_text: 僕達の町

en_text:
Nighttime is
fast approaching.
jp_text: {\fn华文细黑}夜の時間が迫り來る
google_translated: The time of night is coming

en_text:
You are near,
yet so far away.
jp_text: {\fn华文细黑}あなたはこんな近く

en_text: What do you admire?
jp_text: {\fn华文细黑}でも遠い…何に憧れて だれを想うのか
google_translated: }}}} ... What is the one who admires it?

en_text:
Words catch in my throat
at the sight...
jp_text: {\fn华文细黑}透き通る美しさに 言葉を飲んだ
google_translated: } I drank words for the transparent beauty

en_text:
If you are going
to travel the skies,
jp_text: {\fn华文细黑}あなたが空を行くなら

en_text:
...I want to become
your wings.
jp_text: {\fn华文细黑}わたしは翼になりたい
google_translated: I want to be a wing

en_text:
One day, I promise
that I will have...
jp_text: どうしてもだめなの

en_text:
...supple wings that
will never snap...
jp_text: その服に意味を求めないで
google_translated: Do not seek meaning for that clothes

en_text:
...no matter how strong
the wind may be.
jp_text: {\fn华文细黑}どんなに強い風にも
google_translated: } No matter how strong the wind

en_text:
Now I understand why Dio
was so terrified of you.
jp_text: こんなに自分が弱いなんて　思っても見なかった
google_translated: I did not see that I was so weak

en_text:
It's because he knew
you'd destroy his spirit!
jp_text: やさしいのね　クラウス

en_text:
Next time on Last Exile, episode 22.
"Queen Delphine."
jp_text: 次回　ラストエグザイル　第15話
